chat.question: What's the worst part about being you?
tmi: My life is one repeating playback of all my failures.
The long dark hours spent contemplating my existance
my inability to feel confident in otherwise happy situations

chat.question: Tell me about your ex.
tmi: I was left for someone else, and that someone else was my best friend.
she was crazy, made me really miserable

chat.intro: In this life I have regrets
